instFirstReadP: You will now read a paragraph.
instReReadP: You will now read the same paragraph again.
instFirstReadA: You will now read an article, paragraph by paragraph.
instReReadA: You will now read the same article again.
instFirstReadS: You will now read articles about different topics. Each article will have several paragraphs.
instReReadS: You will now be reading again two of the articles which you have already read.

instFirstReadP: You will now be given a question about a paragraph followed by the paragraph. You will need to answer the question.
instReReadP: You will now read the same paragraph again with a different question before the paragraph. You will need to answer the question.
instFirstReadA: You will now read an article, paragraph by paragraph. Before each paragraph, you will be given a question that you will need to answer.
instReReadA: You will now read the same article again with a different question before each paragraph. You will need to answer the questions.
instFirstReadS: You will now read articles about different topics. Each article will have several paragraphs. Before each paragraph, you will be given a question about the paragraph. You will need to answer the question.
instReReadS: You will now be reading again two of the articles which you have already read, and answering new questions about them.
